Package src

Class BillingInfo

java.lang.Object
src.BillingInfo
public class BillingInfo extends Object
The BillingInfo class. This class allows the provider to bill ChocAn when they choose "Bill ChocAn" from the Provider Menu
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shelby Deerman

    • verifyServiceCode

      public static Boolean verifyServiceCode()
      Checks to ensure if the service code is in the Provider Directory Prints the service name and service code and asks the provider to confirm this was the requested service
      Returns:
      either true or false depending on if the service code is in the provider directory

    • enterServiceComments

      public static void enterServiceComments()
      Allows the provider to enter comments about the service and saves it into the comment variable
